title: Blended Learning-Based Mathematics Expertise Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic statistical analysis skills
context.additional_context: Customized applied mathematics education for professionals in the medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in a blended learning environment
Learners can understand the principles of learning design based on the ADDIE model and apply them to actual educational scenarios at least three times
Learners can establish an integrated learning plan combining online real-time sessions and offline materials, utilizing over three types of assessment tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
